EnumProperty.Name: DriverType
EnumProperty.Description: Specific type of driver that will be created

EnumValue.Name: WDM
EnumValue.Description: A WDM driver (including all miniport/port drivers like NDIS, StorPort, etc)

EnumValue.Name: ExportDriver
EnumValue.Description: A WDM driver which exports functions which other drivers can call

EnumProperty.Name: KMDF_VERSION_MAJOR
EnumProperty.Description: Major Version of KMDF that will be used when compiling your driver

EnumProperty.Name: KMDF_VERSION_MINOR
EnumProperty.Description: Minor Version of KMDF that will be used when compiling your driver

BoolProperty.Name: OverrideTargetVersionDefines
BoolProperty.Description: Overrides the default values for preprocessing symbols:_WIN32_WINNT, WINVER, WINNT and NTDDI_VERSION for your source file. Note the default values are controlled by the current target configuration.

BoolProperty.Name: NetAdapterDriver
BoolProperty.DisplayName: Link to the Network Adapter Class Extension
BoolProperty.Description: Indicates whether the driver uses the Network Adapter Class Extension. The Network Adapter Class Extension API may be changed and drivers using the preview version will not receive WHQL certification.

EnumProperty.Name: NETADAPTER_VERSION_MAJOR
EnumProperty.Description: Major version of Network Adapter Class Extension that will be used when compiling your driver

EnumProperty.Name: NETADAPTER_VERSION_MINOR
EnumProperty.Description: Minor version of Network Adapter Class Extension that will be used when compiling your driver
